thread.title: Youtube.com/ArkAngelShaun

author: Youtube.com/ArkAngelShaun
title: Youtube.com/ArkAngelShaun
text: I previously bought a set of 4 18inch alloys with tyres too. they have been fine on my car for the past 6 months. I recently hit a pothole at high speed #LondonProblems and buckled one of them. I called up for a replacement (I had to pay of course) but they dispatched it the same day and it arrived way faster than i thought and my car is now back on the road :D
